comment.author: 30575021@N08
comment._content: This shot has a great vantage point and offers you a better perspective on the subjects at hand.  The color in this is amazing!  It also follows the rule of thirds very well.  I also love how the lighting was set just right so that you can semi-see what's in the background but it's not too clear allowing for more of the focus to be on the women and their project.
